testsuite.name: com.opensource.admin.qa.TC003_Admin_AddNewUser_POM
testsuite.system-out: Lunching URL https://opensource-demo.orangehrmlive.com/ -Login into page by inputting userName, Password and click login button- -user is successfully logged into the page- -user selects admin page- -user is Admin / user management page- -user Clicks Add button- -user is Admin - Add New User- -Add new user - Selecting Role- -Add new user - Selecting The User to generate the new user- -Add new user - Selecting The User Status- -Add new user - Input the New UserName- -Add new user - Input the New Password and confirm it- -Add new user - Click Save button to confirm the new user- -user is Admin / user management page- -Search for user name TestUserJuli- -Validating user search = TestUserJuli- -logging out app- -Validate user has logged out successfully-
